Author: ijustreallymissmydog
Text: ya know, i’ve recently been able to squash some of these thoughts because i started working at a bakery. my first many weeks working i needed to eat EVERYTHING. but what helped me to stop was to realize, those foods that are “enjoyable” are never going anywhere. every day i go to the bakery and i will always have the option to eat cookies and cake, but i know my goals for right now and i know i’m better off without it.. idk i was able to logic my way around eating it all. idk if this helps at all but now it i’m able to choose lower calorie , less tasty foods more often and not feel like i’m “missing out” ya know?
